HEAD: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX gs: <http://www.kopbit.com/20170316113054/GraphSetting#>
WHERE: WHERE { ?node rdf:type gs:NodeUsage. OPTIONAL {?node gs:graph ?o}. OPTIONAL {?node gs:simpleShape ?simpleShape}. OPTIONAL {?node gs:simpleClass ?simpleClass}. OPTIONAL {?node gs:isDetailFirst ?i}.OPTIONAL {?o gs:type ?graphType}.OPTIONAL {?o gs:description ?graphDescription}.OPTIONAL {?node gs:nodeType ?cnt}.OPTIONAL {?cnt gs:type ?nodeType}.OPTIONAL {?cnt gs:description ?nodeTypeDescription}.OPTIONAL {?node gs:nodeDefine ?cnd}.OPTIONAL {?cnd gs:width ?width}.OPTIONAL {?cnd gs:height ?height}.OPTIONAL {?cnd gs:type ?type}. OPTIONAL {?cnd gs:text ?text}.

HEAD: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX gs: <http://www.kopbit.com/20170316113054/GraphSetting#>
WHERE: WHERE { OPTIONAL{?node gs:nodeDefine ?nodeDefine. OPTIONAL{?nodeDefine gs:shape ?shape}. OPTIONAL{?shape gs:dock ?dock}.OPTIONAL{?shape gs:x ?x}.OPTIONAL{?shape gs:y ?y}.OPTIONAL{?shape gs:g ?g}.OPTIONAL{?node gs:graph ?o}.OPTIONAL{?node gs:isDetailFirst ?i}.OPTIONAL{?o gs:type ?graphType}.}.

HEAD: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX gs: <http://www.kopbit.com/20170316113054/GraphSetting#>
WHERE: WHERE { OPTIONAL {?text gs:container ?container. OPTIONAL { ?container gs:dock ?cd}. OPTIONAL { ?container gs:x ?cx}. OPTIONAL { ?container gs:y ?cy}. OPTIONAL {?container gs:path ?cp. OPTIONAL { ?cp gs:d ?cp_d}.OPTIONAL { ?cp gs:class_dp ?cp_class}.}.}. OPTIONAL {?text gs:shape ?shape.OPTIONAL { ?shape gs:dock ?sd}.OPTIONAL { ?shape gs:x ?sx}.OPTIONAL { ?shape gs:y ?sy}.OPTIONAL {?shape gs:path ?sp.OPTIONAL { ?sp gs:d ?sp_d}.OPTIONAL { ?sp gs:class_dp ?sp_class}.}.}.

HEAD: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX gs: <http://www.kopbit.com/20170316113054/GraphSetting#>
WHERE: WHERE {?g rdf:type gs:G. OPTIONAL{?g gs:g* ?gs}. OPTIONAL{?gs gs:g ?gsg}.OPTIONAL{?g gs:path ?p.OPTIONAL{?p gs:d ?d}.OPTIONAL{?p gs:class_dp ?class}.}.OPTIONAL{?gs gs:g ?gsg.?gsg gs:path ?gp.OPTIONAL{?gp gs:d ?gp_d}.OPTIONAL{?gp gs:class_dp ?gp_class}.}.

HEAD: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX gs: <http://www.kopbit.com/20170316113054/GraphSetting#>
WHERE: WHERE {?l gs:graph ?g.?l rdf:type gs:LinkUsage. OPTIONAL{?l gs:isDetailFirst ?i}.OPTIONAL{?l gs:linkeType ?t}.OPTIONAL{?g gs:type ?gt}.OPTIONAL{?g gs:description ?gd}.OPTIONAL{?t gs:type ?lt}.OPTIONAL{?t gs:description ?td}.OPTIONAL{?l gs:linkDefine ?d}.OPTIONAL{?d gs:startArrow ?s.OPTIONAL{?s gs:d ?s_d}.OPTIONAL{?s gs:class_dp ?s_class}.}.OPTIONAL{?d gs:endArrow ?e.OPTIONAL{?e gs:d ?e_d}.OPTIONAL{?e gs:class_dp ?e_class}.}.OPTIONAL{?d gs:line ?line.OPTIONAL{?line gs:d ?line_d}.OPTIONAL{?line gs:class_dp ?line_class}.}.OPTIONAL{?d gs:text ?texts}.

head: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
select_where: WHERE { {where} GRAPH <http://www.kopbit.com/temp> { ?s ?p ?o.}OPTIONAL {?s owl:unionOf ?unionOf .}OPTIONAL {?s owl:intersectionOf ?intersectionOf .}OPTIONAL {?s owl:oneOf ?oneOf .}OPTIONAL {?s owl:complementOf ?complementOf .}}
